mapper.insert: insert into source (ID, SOURCE_PACKAGE_ID, `NAME`, `STATUS`, SEQ, DESCRIPTION, URL, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourcePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update source set SOURCE_PACKAGE_ID = #{sourcePackageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SOURCE_PACKAGE_ID, `NAME`, `STATUS`, SEQ, DESCRIPTION, URL, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_ID from source where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, SOURCE_PACKAGE_ID, `NAME`, `STATUS`, SEQ, DESCRIPTION, URL, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_ID from source
